name: prosthodontics
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the area of dentistry (= the work of a dentist) connected with replacing missing, damaged, or unattractive teeth : Implants have changed prosthodontics more than any other innovation in dentistry. All specialists in prosthodontics will have typically undertaken three years of specialist training.
More examplesFewer examplesDr Wilson is a specialist in prosthodontics.The postdoctoral students are in dental speciality courses such as prosthodontics and oral surgery.The dentists at Smile are specialists in prosthodontics, endodontics and laser periodontics.
